metadata.description: Join the ever expanding experience of Hell Let Loose - a hardcore World War Two first person shooter with epic battles of 100 players with infantry, tanks, artillery, a dynamically shifting front line and a unique resource based RTS-inspired meta-game.

dlcItemList.description: Zeltbahn German Cape for the following roles: Rifleman, Support, Medic, Sniper, Auto Rifleman, Heavy MG, Spotter, Assault, Engineer, Anti-Tank and Officer, *Helmet not included

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - False Front Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - False Front Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - False Front

dlcItemList.description: Unlock access to the Skull Bucket bundle and get the job done with this unique selection of six new helmets.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Skull Bucket Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Skull Bucket Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Skull Bucket

dlcItemList.description: Unlock access to join the Silver Vanguard and take to the front lines with an array of unique helmets and uniforms.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose – Silver Vanguard Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose – Silver Vanguard Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose – Silver Vanguard

dlcItemList.description: Airborne Pathfinder Uniform

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Hot Drop Offer

dlcItemList.description: The Lethal Tide DLC contains: Marine Cap for the following roles: Rifleman, Support, Medic, Sniper, Auto Rifleman, Heavy MG, Spotter, Assault, Engineer, Anti-Tank, Officer

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose – Lethal Tide Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose – Lethal Tide Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose – Lethal Tide

dlcItemList.description: Stained with grease and grime from the heavy machinery, this well-insulated mix of suede and sheep’s wool kept the Soviet tank crews warm to help them survive and battle through the relentless winter weather, (Available for the Soviet Tank Commander and Crewman)

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Cavalry Coat Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Cavalry Coat Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Cavalry Coat

dlcItemList.description: Hell Let Loose - Ultimate Edition Upgrade Pack_SeasonPassAudience
dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Ultimate Edition Upgrade Pack_SeasonPassAudience

dlcItemList.description: Hell Let Loose - Deluxe Edition Upgrade Pack_SeasonPassAudience
dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Deluxe Edition Upgrade Pack_SeasonPassAudience

dlcItemList.description: Get ready for Christmas in Hell Let Loose with the Winter Warfare Helmet pack, Pack available for free for a limited time as a thank you to our community!

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Winter Warfare Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Winter Warfare Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Winter Warfare

dlcItemList.description: Join the elite troops at the forefront of the combat with the Pea Dot DLC. This Erbsenmuster camouflage, commonly known as the pea dot pattern, worked to improve the camouflage characteristics of the uniform.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Pea Dot Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Pea Dot Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Pea Dot

dlcItemList.description: Emerge from the foliage with this autumn version of the iconic Oak Leaf camo pattern that was used by troops throughout WW2.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Oak Leaf Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Oak Leaf Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Oak Leaf

dlcItemList.description: Add the Panzer-Lehr Uniform DLC to your collection and be part of one of the most elite units in the entire German Wehrmacht. Take to the battlefield as both infantry and recon units.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Panzer Lehr Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Panzer Lehr Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Panzer Lehr

dlcItemList.description: This DLC unlocks 3 Helmets: “Near Miss” M1 Battle Damaged Helmet (US), “Near Miss” M42 Battle Damaged Helmet (German), “Near Miss” SSh-40 Battle Damaged Helmet (Soviet)

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Near Miss Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Near Miss Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Near Miss

dlcItemList.description: A “Thank You” to all our players for their support over the past 12 months, This DLC unlocks 1 Helmet: “Near Miss” Mk II Battle Damaged Helmet (British 8th Army)

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Near Miss - British 8th Army Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Near Miss - British 8th Army Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Near Miss - British 8th Army

dlcItemList.description: Drop into the thick of the action with our latest Free DLC. This uniform showcases the historical changes the US Airborne had to make to their uniform due to the material lacking strength in key areas such as the elbows and knees.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Airborne M1942 Reinforced Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Airborne M1942 Reinforced Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Airborne M1942 Reinforced

dlcItemList.description: Add the Wacht am Rhein Units DLC to your collection and be a part of the battle at Elsenborn Ridge.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Wacht am Rhein Units Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Wacht am Rhein Units Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Wacht am Rhein Units

dlcItemList.description: Unlock access to join the Upper Echelon and take command of the front lines with these unique uniforms for the Commander Role. Show off your rank and station with the "Field Blue Heer Officer" uniform for the German forces or stride out in your "Summer Service" uniform for the US

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose – Upper Echelon Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose – Upper Echelon Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose – Upper Echelon

dlcItemList.description: US Jungle Frogskin Uniform for the following roles: Rifleman, Support, Medic, Sniper, Auto Rifleman, Heavy MG, Spotter, Assault, Engineer, Anti-Tank and Officer.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Tropic Fever Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Tropic Fever Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Tropic Fever

dlcItemList.description: Surviving the frontlines and wearing the scars to prove it, these new German uniforms tell stories of close calls and hard fought battles.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Battle Scarred Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Battle Scarred Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Battle Scarred

dlcItemList.description: Soviet Steel Bib Over Ameba Summer Uniform  for the following roles: Rifleman, Support, Medic, Sniper, Auto Rifleman, Heavy MG, Spotter, Assault, Engineer, Anti-Tank and Officer, *Helmet not included

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Red Steel Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Red Steel Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Red Steel

dlcItemList.description: Enlist in one of the key units that made up the British forces in WW2. Famed for their maroon berets and actions during key objectives throughout the conflict including Operation Market Garden. Included the British Airborne for use in our in-game map Driel.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Red Devils Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Red Devils Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Red Devils

dlcItemList.description: Immerse into the pivotal fight for Mortain with the "Operation Lüttich bundle". This DLC covers both the US and German side of the battle that fought at Mortain.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Operation Lüttich Units Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Operation Lüttich Units Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Operation Lüttich Units

dlcItemList.description:
Worn at the beginning of WW2 during the bleak winter weather, the Jericho Cap worked to keep the Soviet soldiers warm so they could continue the fight.
(Available to the Soviet Commander, Infantry, Armour and Recon units)

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Jericho Cap Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Jericho Cap Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Jericho Cap

dlcItemList.description: With Red Marshall you can take command of the front lines with this unique uniform for the Soviet Forces Commander role. Lead your troops onto the battlefield with the "Soviet M35 Officer" uniform.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose – Red Marshall Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose – Red Marshall Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose – Red Marshall

dlcItemList.description: Add a new dimension to the battlefield with the Luftwaffe Eagles DLC. As part of the German Luftwaffe forces, the Fallschirmjäger were the first paratroopers to feature in large scale airborne based operations.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Luftwaffe Eagles Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Luftwaffe Eagles Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Luftwaffe Eagles

dlcItemList.description: Blaze into glorious victory with the Red Skies DLC. Used by soldiers throughout the war, particularly in battles between January and February 1942, the Soviet Airborne uniform was worn by soldiers to help them fight in even the most adverse weather conditions.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Red Skies Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Red Skies Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Red Skies

dlcItemList.description: The efforts and sacrifices of the 1st Polish Independent Parachute Brigade are unfortunately much overlooked or diminished in the recounting of Operation Market Garden. And so now you can enlist as the brave troops that fought at Driel.

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Polish Parachute Brigade Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Polish Parachute Brigade Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Polish Parachute Brigade

dlcItemList.description: Summer has arrived and with it a new uniform for the US Infantry, Uniform Pack includes: US M1943 Combat Uniform, Pack available for free for a limited time as a thank you to our community!

keyImages.alt: Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Summer Warfare Pack Offer
Download Hell Let Loose Hell Let Loose - Summer Warfare Pack Offer

dlcItemList.title: Hell Let Loose - Summer Warfare Pack
